attributes.action: Stop people parking in disabled parking bays who have not got a badge
attributes.additional_details: Because there is not enough penalty’s for parking in disabled spots as I have witnessed being a disabled badge holder, there has been many occasions where I couldn’t parking in a disabled spot due to people parking there who shouldn’t be
attributes.background: A stricter penalty’s for parking in disabled spots instead of just a deterrent and supermarket security to be able to enforce penalty’s

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking enforcement is a matter for landowners and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
